function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low ventilation score (89%)","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems to meet recommended standards","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, HEPA filters","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Low electricity score (17%)","Impact":"Absence of onsite electricity generation and storage","Mitigation":"Invest in onsite electricity generation and storage solutions","Technologies":"Solar panels, energy storage systems","People":"Building occupants, utility company","Owner":"Building owner, energy management company"},{"Description":"High overall impact scores (72-80%)","Impact":"Potential positive impact on disease transmission due to high building domain scores","Mitigation":"Regular health assessments and monitoring of building occupants","Technologies":"IoT health monitoring devices, real-time health data analytics","People":"Building occupants, facility management","Owner":"Building owner, health management company"}]}
